go2avro T
cmp stdout expect-stdout

go2avro example.com/foo/bar.T
cmp stdout expect-stdout

-- expect-stdout --
{
    "fields": [
        {
            "default": 0,
            "name": "X",
            "type": "long"
        }
    ],
    "name": "T",
    "type": "record"
}
-- bar.go --
package bar

type T struct {
	X int
}

-- go.mod --
module example.com/foo/bar

go 1.14

require github.com/heetch/avro v0.0.0-20200318154341-de261c0e4b7f // indirect
